index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement for and acceptance of Financial Assistance from the United States of America, Department of Housing and Urban Development, for an Urban Development Action Grant (UDAG) to assist in the Development of Urban Renewal Parcel 48 (Promenade 23 Program) in the Yesler-Atlantic Neighborhood Project Area, (WASH-R-5); appropriating funds received into the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund; authorizing implementation of a project by the Department or Community Development and making the appropriations therefor; establishing a repayment account in the Community Development Block Grant Fund; authorizing the Mayor or his Designatee to enter into necessary agreements; and repealing Ordinance 108479.
